name: addgt0ii

stmt.origin: mp2an(wbr(nat0, clt, co(c0, caddc, c1)), wbr(nat0, clt, c0), wbr(nat0, clt, c1))

comment: Addition of 2 positive numbers is positive. (Contributed by NM, 18-May-1999.)
